publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3909 Margo MacDonald: War with Iraq - Not in Scotland's Name-That the Parliament, mindful of its duty to faithfully reflect and promote Scottish opinion internationally and following the demonstrations against war with Iraq on 15 February 2003, reminds Her Majesty's Government that any decision to initiate war with Iraq will be taken not in our name.
S1M-3909 War with Iraq - Not in Scotland's Name (lodged on 17 February 2003) Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-3909 Margo MacDonald: War with Iraq - Not in Scotland's Name-That the Parliament, mindful of its duty to faithfully reflect and promote Scottish opinion internationally and following the demonstrations against war with Iraq on 15 February 2003, reminds Her Majesty's Government that any decision to initiate war with Iraq will be taken not in our name. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan
S1M-3909 War with Iraq - Not in Scotland's Name (lodged on 17 February 2003) Robin Harper*R, Mr Lloyd Quinan*

S1M-3909 Margo MacDonald: War with Iraq - Not in Scotland's Name—That the Parliament, mindful of its duty to faithfully reflect and promote Scottish opinion internationally and following the demonstrations against war with Iraq on 15 February 2003, reminds Her Majesty’s Government that any decision to initiate war with Iraq will be taken not in our name. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Robin Harper R, Mr Lloyd Quinan
